definition: to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to row/to paddle/profitable/worth (the effort)/it pays (to do sth)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: Generally, you should try to make gradations in the notes involved.
sentences.chinese: 通常来说，你应该试着将所用到的音符划分等级。
但是，招聘人员却非常注重按类别来划分。

sentences.english: A method for division of reservoir petrophysical facies by fuzzy clustering is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了应用模糊聚类划分储集层岩石物理相的方法。

sentences.english: That means when the judge decided how the property would be divided in the divorce.
sentences.chinese: 那就是说离婚时当法官作出决定财产是如何划分的。

sentences.english: Under certain conditions, the operator of anomaly separation is simply an upward continuation operator.
sentences.chinese: 在一定条件下，异常划分算子就是向上延拓算子。

sentences.english: "What you can do now, at best, is to assign people to a part of West Africa, " Jackson says.
sentences.chinese: 现在能做的顶多是将人们划分为西非的一部分。

sentences.english: Ligature glyph widths are divided evenly among the characters they represent.
sentences.chinese: 连字字形宽度以它们代表的字符均匀的划分。

sentences.english: These stages are distinguished by what a learner is able to see.
sentences.chinese: 这四个阶段是根据学习者可以理解的东西来划分的。

sentences.english: Venue - Authority of a court to hear a matter based on geographical location.
sentences.chinese: 法院审理案件的权力依据地理位置所做的划分。

sentences.english: Are classified, in general, with the permanent population.
sentences.chinese: 一般是按常住人口划分的。

sentences.english: The U. S . and Canada are zoned for postal delivery.
sentences.chinese: 美国和加拿大划分了邮区。

sentences.english: Partitions are divisions in the formatting of the hard disk.
sentences.chinese: 分区就是硬盘格式化过程中的空间划分。

sentences.english: The experiments show that our mail community partition algo…
sentences.chinese: 实验表明，这种社区划分算法能够发现高质量的社区。

sentences.english: As you can see, each item in the tree is divided into columns.
sentences.chinese: 正如您可以看到的，树中的每一个项都被划分到列中。

sentences.english: Whirl it and divide to north and to south.
sentences.chinese: 疾速旋转并划分隔为到北和到南。

sentences.english: This article is not intended to provide a guide to the mechanisms by which overloading and partitioning can be prevented.
sentences.chinese: 本文将不对阻止过载或是划分的机制介绍。

definition: to differentiate/to draw a distinction/to divide into categories
to divide (into)/to split a bonus/to break into/tenths/percentage allotment
in general/more or less/in rough terms/basically/on the whole/overall situation/the big picture/(Tw) remains (of a dead person)
can be divided (into parts)/one can distinguish (several types)
